title: Since Riot hasn't made one yet, I made an anime opening for the new Star Guardians!

embed.description: Really excited to see the Star Guardian skin line come back in 2019, so I wanted to make my version of an anime opening since Riot hasn't made one yet. Hope you guys enjoy!

body: Really excited to see the Star Guardian skin line come back in 2019, so I wanted to make my version of an anime opening. Hope you guys enjoy!

replies.body: Zoe in the opening makes me wanna go next not gonna lie. The rest, not too bad. Well done {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
